effect.black_white: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 20% chance to raise the user’s Attack one stage.
effect.black_2_white_2: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 20% chance to raise the user’s Attack one stage.

short_effect.black_white: Has a 20% chance to raise the user’s Attack by one stage.
short_effect.black_2_white_2: Has a 20% chance to raise the user’s Attack by one stage.

flavor_text.black_white: The target is hit with a hard punch fired like a meteor. It may also raise the user’s Attack.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: The target is hit with a hard punch fired like a meteor. It may also raise the user’s Attack.
